metadata.name: amorce Zero-Trust Specialist Agent
metadata.description: The reference implementation for the Agnostic Transaction Protocol (ATP), offering secure, signed task execution via a Gemini-powered specialist.
metadata.creator: Trebort Golin

intents.name: GET_MANIFEST
intents.description: Returns the agent's full capabilities and trust information (this manifest itself).

intents.name: CHAT_TURN
intents.description: Drives the main conversational turn, processes user input, and maintains the state.

intents.name: SEARCH_FLIGHT
intents.description: A specific action for searching for flights based on provided parameters (example intent).

intents.name: BOOK_FLIGHT
intents.description: A specific action to book a flight based on parameters extracted from the conversation (example intent).
